subject: [Invitation__ for_- Research__Paper__open__access__journal!!!]
body:
DEAR RESPECTED COLLEAGUE, I wish to inform you that IJO Journal is still accepting research papers, theses, commentaries, dissertations and write-ups for proofreading. Our major aim is to help researchers publish quality research works devoid of grammatical errors. We are therefore requesting authors to send their research works for thorough grammatical editing. If interested, kindly submit paper or direct your colleague (s) to any of the following email addresses: editor@ijojournal.com OUR JOURNALS:- [1] Payment for proofread research paper is via any of the following ways below: * Bank Transfer * PayPal * Western Union Money Transfer Our effective editing board makes sure that each paper you send to us gets back to you within 96 hours (4 days) upon receipt of payment confirmation. Our services include: * Proofreading * Editing grammatical errors * Proper punctuation * Paraphrasing and editing of sentences, aligning of articles and any other errors _WHATSAPP CONTACT NO.: +91 9991551673 (CONTACT FOR RAPID ASSISTANCE FOR YOUR ARTICLE.)_ WITH REGARDS IJO JOURNAL http://ijojournal.com IJO JOURNAL NOTE: IN CASE YOU ARE RECEIVING OUR E-MAIL IN YOUR JUNK-MAIL/SPAM, MARK THIS E-MAIL AS NOT JUNK/SPAM OR ADD IT TO YOUR SAFE SENDER'S LIST. If you think this mail is not related to your field please reply UNSUBSCRIBE. You will no longer receive emails from us. Thanks: info@ijojournal.com Links: ------ [1] http://ijojournal.com

Dear Respected Colleague,

I wish to inform you that IJO Journal is still accepting research papers, theses, commentaries, dissertations and write-ups for proofreading. Our major aim is to help researchers publish quality research works devoid of grammatical errors. We are therefore requesting authors to send their research works for thorough grammatical editing. If interested, kindly submit paper or direct your colleague (s) to any of the following email addresses:
editor@ijojournal.com

Our Journals:-
Payment for proofread research paper is via any of the following ways below:
•    Bank Transfer
•    PayPal
•    Western Union Money Transfer

Our effective editing board makes sure that each paper you send to us gets back to you within 96 hours (4 days) upon receipt of payment confirmation. Our services include:
•    Proofreading
•    Editing grammatical errors
•    Proper punctuation
•    Paraphrasing and editing of sentences, aligning of articles
and any other errors

WhatsApp Contact No.: +91 9991551673 (Contact for rapid assistance for your article.)
With Regards

IJO JOURNAL

http://ijojournal.com

IJO Journal

Note:

In case you are receiving our e-mail in your Junk-mail/Spam, mark this e-mail as Not Junk/Spam or add it to your Safe Sender's list.

If you think this mail is not related to your field please reply Unsubscribe. You will no longer receive emails from us. Thanks: info@ijojournal.com
